vtrun.cmd:
@echo off
SET "$case_name=demos_004a"
SET "$vd_file_name=demos_004a_1103"
Title demos_004a [ Demo Step 004 PEAK RSV ] [DEMOS_004A] 
CALL ..\..\..\GAMS_SrcTIMES.v4.5.4\VT_GAMS %$case_name% ..\..\GAMS_SrcTIMES.v4.5.4 GAMSSAVE\%$case_name% '' ..\ lo=1 2>&1 | tee "%$case_name%_run_log.txt"
GDX2VEDA GAMSSAVE\%$case_name% ..\..\..\GAMS_SrcTIMES.v4.5.4\times2veda.vdd %$vd_file_name%
@echo Closed >RunTerminated
peak_rsv.dd:
$ONEMPTY
$ONEPS
$ONWARNING
$SET RUN_NAME 'DEMOS_004A'
$SET SCENARIO_NAME 'peak_rsv'


SET COM_PEAK

/
'REG1'.'ELC'
/;

PARAMETER

COM_PKRSV ' '/
'REG1'.2005.'ELC' 0.05
'REG1'.2020.'ELC' 0.2
/;

scaind 1
rerun yes
iis yes
lpmethod 4
baralg 1
barcrossalg 0
barorder 0
THREADS=7
aggind 3
Names no
advind=0

runfile.run:
*<VEDA_VERSION>

OPTION PROFILE=1, SOLVEOPT=REPLACE;
*<GAMSOPTIONS>

*<OPTIMIZER>

*--If you want to use an optimizer other than cplex/xpress, enter it here:
*OPTION LP=MyOptimizer;

$OFFLISTING
*$ONLISTING

* activate validation to force VAR_CAP/COMPRD
$SET VALIDATE 'NO'
* reduction of equation system
$SET REDUCE   'YES'
*--------------------------------------------------------------*
* BATINCLUDE calls should all be with lower case file names!!! *
*--------------------------------------------------------------*

* initialize the environment variables
$ SET DSCAUTO YES 
$   SET VDA YES 
$   SET DEBUG                          'NO'
$   SET DUMPSOL                        'NO'
$   SET SOLVE_NOW                      'YES'
$   SET MODEL_NAME                     'TIMES'
$   IF DECLARED REG      $SET STARTRUN 'RESTART'
$   IF NOT DECLARED REG  $SET STARTRUN 'SCRATCH'
$SET XTQA YES
* VAR_UC being set so that non-binding constraints appear in results
$SET VAR_UC YES 
*<SET FLAGS>

* merge declarations & data
$   ONMULTI

* the times-slices MUST come 1st to ensure ordering OK
*<INCLUDE ALLTS>

*<perform fixed declarations>
$   BATINCLUDE initsys.mod

* declare the (system/user) empties
$   BATINCLUDE initmty.mod
*$   BATINCLUDE initmty.mod DSC
$IF NOT DECLARED REG_BNDCST $Abort "You need to use TIMES v2.3.1 or higher"

*<INCLUDE DD FILES>

*<GLOBAL Parameters>

$ SET VEDAVDD 'YES'

* do the rest
$ BATINCLUDE maindrv.mod mod

ANNUAL

demos_004a.run:
$TITLE Veda2 -- v3.2.1.0


OPTION PROFILE=1, SOLVEOPT=REPLACE;
OPTION RESLIM=50000, ITERLIM=999999, LIMROW=0, LIMCOL=0, SOLPRINT=OFF;



option LP=cplex;



*--If you want to use an optimizer other than cplex/xpress, enter it here:
*OPTION LP=MyOptimizer;


$OFFLISTING
*$ONLISTING


* activate validation to force VAR_CAP/COMPRD
$SET VALIDATE 'NO'
* reduction of equation system
$SET REDUCE   'YES'
*--------------------------------------------------------------*
* BATINCLUDE calls should all be with lower case file names!!! *
*--------------------------------------------------------------*


* initialize the environment variables
$ SET DSCAUTO YES 
$   SET VDA YES 
$   SET DEBUG                          'NO'
$   SET DUMPSOL                        'NO'
$   SET SOLVE_NOW                      'YES'
$   SET MODEL_NAME                     'TIMES'
$   IF DECLARED REG      $SET STARTRUN 'RESTART'
$   IF NOT DECLARED REG  $SET STARTRUN 'SCRATCH'
$SET XTQA YES
* VAR_UC being set so that non-binding constraints appear in results
$SET VAR_UC YES 
$ SET OBJ AUTO
$ SET MID_YEAR YES
$ SET OBLONG YES
$SET DAMAGE NO
$ SET STAGES NO
$SET SOLVEDA 'YES'
$SET VARCOST LIN
$ SET DSC NO
$SET DATAGDX YES





* merge declarations & data
$   ONMULTI


* the times-slices MUST come 1st to ensure ordering OK
$BATINCLUDE demos_004a_ts.dd


*<perform fixed declarations>
$SET BOTIME 1980
$   BATINCLUDE initsys.mod


* declare the (system/user) empties
$   BATINCLUDE initmty.mod
*$   BATINCLUDE initmty.mod DSC
$IF NOT DECLARED REG_BNDCST $Abort "You need to use TIMES v2.3.1 or higher"


$BATINCLUDE base.dd
$BATINCLUDE syssettings.dd
$BATINCLUDE peak_rsv.dd

SET MILESTONYR /2005,2006,2010,2015,2020/;
$SET RUN_NAME 'demos_004a'






$ SET VEDAVDD 'YES'


* do the rest
$ BATINCLUDE maindrv.mod mod
